name: Add new Monday.com items from Elementor form submissions
description: Streamline your lead management process by automatically transferring form submissions from Elementor to your Monday.com board. With this template, every time a new form is filled out on your Elementor site, Make will create a corresponding item in Monday.com, ensuring that you never miss a lead and can efficiently track your follow-ups. This integration helps you maintain organized workflows and enhances your team's productivity.
